Title: Relates to regulatory fines for small businesses
Summary: Provides guidelines to determine regulatory fines for small businesses and amends the effective date for S. 5815-C and A. 7540-B to be repealed two years after the effective date.
LawCode: Amd ยง170-c, Exec L; amd ยง2, Chap of 2019 (as proposed in S.5815-C & A.7540-B)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to regulatory fines for small businesses; and to amend a chapter of the laws of 2019, amending the executive law relating to regulatory fines for small businesses, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
